result.arabic_text: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
result.translation: Ba bashitsi b’abamalayika bamwishuye bati: “Iyo nkuru tuyikubwiye nk’uko yavuzwe n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yo Mushoboravyose; mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ni Intungane mu vyo Ikora, Nyenubumenyikurivyose”.
